name: Exiled from Court (Beeanca Writing)
description:
Exiled from Court takes place in Albarzia in the 19th century, a fictional setting based on Brazil well-known for its immoral and mischievous citizens and its monarchy's corruption.

You play as The Hedonist, a young noble exiled from court looking to find their way back.

  • Play as male, female or non-binary, with your gender impacting the world around you;
  • Romance six different characters (three men and three women);
  • Four different reasons for your exile;
  • Deal with your problematic family;
  • Fight to be reinstated at Court;
  • Attempt to become a better person...
  • …Or spend all your time enjoying every single one of life’s pleasures

Romantic Options (ROs):

  • Camila (bar owner and your friend);
  • Sabina (a nun):
  • Narcissa (the Emperor's mistress);
  • Val (a Broody Boy™);
  • Calvin (the Emperor's advisor);
  • Harry (your sister's husband)
